title: Verifi Order Insight Integration
description: Implemented Visa's Verifi Order Insight solution enabling merchants to share transaction details with issuers, increasing dispute win rates by 15%.
fullDescription: Integration of Visa's Verifi Order Insight service that allows merchants to share detailed transaction information with issuers in real-time during the dispute inquiry process, deflecting chargebacks before they escalate.
problem: Merchants were losing friendly fraud disputes due to inability to provide transaction evidence to issuers at the point of inquiry.
constraints: Required real-time response to issuer inquiries. Must integrate with existing merchant transaction systems and Verifi's API specifications.
approach: Built integration layer between merchant transaction data and Verifi Order Insight API. Implemented automated evidence enrichment and real-time response handling.
tradeoffs: Chose comprehensive data enrichment over minimal responses to maximize dispute deflection. Accepted integration complexity for better merchant outcomes.
execution: Delivered as part of Pagos chargeback prevention offering. Coordinated with Visa and merchant technical teams.
outcomes: Increased merchant chances of winning friendly fraud disputes by 15%. Strengthened merchants' evidence for dispute representment.
whatIdImprove: Would build more merchant self-service configuration for evidence selection.
